description:
After Kiyotaka finishes shopping for dinner, he stops by the Shopping District`s lottery. When he spins the wheel around, he wins third prize, tickest to Sakura Park`s Heated Pool!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai to Yume to Kibou ga Afureru Tokoro
The Place Overflowing with Love, Dreams, and Hope
愛と夢と希望が溢れる場所
